architectural_notes: For backgrounds that must not be cropped, use CSS background-size: contain with background-repeat: no-repeat (and appropriate background-position).

existing_features.title: Update the global responsive background CSS so the body background image is never cropped by switching from `background-size: cover` to `background-size: contain` (mobile and desktop), while keeping the existing background image asset references and `background-repeat: no-repeat`.

Adjust global `background-position` values for the body background (mobile default and the `@media (min-width: 768px)` rule) as needed so the full image remains fully visible and not shifted off-screen after switching to `background-size: contain`.

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust background image to display fully with no cropping (use CSS background-size: contain)

projectName: Show full background image with no cropping (use background-size: contain)
